div.h2: HL7 V2 Table 0203 - Identifier Type (NZ Extended)
div.p: HL7 V2 table 0203 extensions for New Zealand use

title.value: HL7 V2 Table 0203 - Identifier Type (NZ Extended)

description.value: Extended concept codes for identifier type for use in New Zealand context

definition.value: Nationally assigned organisation identifier, that is commonly a HPI Organisation Identifier
National provider at organisation identifier; combined identifier [HPI Person ID (CPN)]@[HPI Facility or Organisation ID]
A unique vendor identifier allocated to a provider directory entry (PractitionerRole or HealthcareService), typically used for routing secure messages
